section_title: 22g23. Offsetting subsistence allowance paid military personnel.
text:
Military
subsistence allowances may not be included in the amounts offset against the
salary required by 29 CFR part 541 because such payments constitute payment for
board, lodging, or other facilities. But see 29 CFR ยง 541.602(b)(3) regarding
military pay.
